You can choose whether you want to add i: Ungakhetha ukuthi uyafuna yini ukwengeza imali engenile noma izindleko esitatimendeni sakho emali engenile
Let's go through one example! Tap income: Ake sibone isibonelo esisodwa! Thinta imali engenile
See a list of income types. For income t: Bona uhlu lwezinhlobo zemali engenile Uma kunohlobo lwemali engenile olungekho kulolu hlu, ungakhetha lapho kuthi 'Okunye'
Let's pretend you received a donation to: Ake sishaye sengathi uthole umnikelo namhlanje, thinta lapha!
You will need to fill in all the info on: Uzodinga ukugcwalisa lonke ulwazi kulesi sikrini
I've filled in an example for you! Now t: Sengikwenzele ngakugcwalisela isibonelo! Manje thinta lapho okuthi khona Londoloza
Great! Your income has now been added to: Kuhle! Imali yakho engenile manje isifakiwe esitatimendeni semali engenayo esifinyeziwe kuthebhu yemali
You can see, change, or download you sta: Uyakwazi ukubona, ushintshe, noma udawunilode izitatimende zakho ngokuthinta le nkinobho.
Great job, you're ready to start!: Kuhle kakhulu! Umholo wakho manje usufakiwe esitatimendeni somholo esifingqiwe kuthebhu yemali.
